63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Al-Musaiyab's grand-father:In the pre-lslamic period of ignorance a flood of rain came and filled the valley in between the two mountains (around the Ka`ba)

chapter.eng-name: The days of Pre-Islamic Period of Ignorance
